title: Cafe Turtle
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, Indian, International, Italian, Juice bar, Take-out
description: Cosmopolitan caf√© on the top floor of Full Circle bookstore, popular with local literati and expats. Menu offers a mix of Indian, Italian, Middle Eastern, and Mexican dishes, plus desserts, coffee, and fresh juices. Some lacto-vegetarian choices, a few vegan ones (not marked but servers can tell you which are). The entrance is in the middle alley, near Fabindia.
